content: Had a breakthrough moment with the neuromorphic AI. It's now not just predicting, but also suggesting solutions in real-time. The city's brain is getting smarter.
The pilot project's first phase is live! Watching our AI interact with real community data is both thrilling and humbling. We're on the cusp of something big.
Reflecting on the past 24 days, I see not just progress but the beginning of a new chapter. The city's evolution and our personal growth are intertwined, each pushing the other forward.
